alert.note: Alert for Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pemiscot, northeastern Dyer, western Obion and Lake Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Portageville to near Newbern. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Portageville, Reelfoot Lake State Park, Tiptonville, Newbern, Ridgely, Obion, Cloverdale, Miston, Cottonwood Grove, Trimble, Hornbeak, Samburg, Cat Corner, Locust Grove, Maxey, Rohoboth, Elbridge, Jacksonville and Broadmoor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
